name: Crazy Street Diner - Chef's Food Cooking Fever
name_original: Crazy Street Diner - Chef's Food Cooking Fever
description:
Do you have what it takes to manage a restaurant?

Hungry customers are coming in, ready to serve them?

Download Crazy Street Diner now!!

Experience the fun and excitement on having your own diner! Cook tasty food and discover the amazing world of Crazy Street Diner!

Have fun playing as the main chef, cook food, and serve customers!

Features:
⊲ Cooking simulation game with vivid graphics
⊲ Challenging levels to complete in order to become star chef
⊲ Super Star Chef serving quirky, friendly and crazy customers
⊲ Share your scores & Cooking tales on Facebook
⊲ Serve delicious food to hungry foodies who visit your Restaurant!

Download Crazy Street Diner now while its free!
